pages.metric: The Board of Directors of DBS Group Holdings Ltd (“DBSH” or “the Company”) reports the following:
Nine-month net profit up 11% to record SGD 8.79 billion, return on equity at 18.8% Board announces new SGD 3 billion share buyback programme
Commercial book net interest income increased 1% to SGD 3.80 billion. Net interest margin was stable at 2.83% helped by the repricing of fixed-rate assets. Loans expanded SGD 3 billion or 1%
Commercial book net fee income rose 32%, led by a 55% increase in wealth management. Commercial book other non-interest income grew 4%, with the increase also driven by wealth
basis points of loans for the third quarter. Allowance coverage was at 135% and at 242% after considering collateral.
